body:
OH SNAPPALDOODLES! 

Staff Applications are opening as of next year in a few days. :3
And although I'm not part of the staff team anymore and I've basically left Avicus in general, I can't wait to see who is going to become a blossoming flower and become a part of the Staff team. 

List your real opinion on who you think will be a staff member after these staff applications!
Please be mature on this topic, do not discourage anyone from applying or trying out for staff. If someone elects a person, do not derogate anyone from becoming a possible staff member. Everyone should have a try and remember to give solid reasoning on why you think (Blank) will become a staff member! ^_^

Good luck to all who will be applying!
